data.news_body: In continuation to our earlier letter dated 26.04.2023 and in compliance to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing and Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, it is to inform that Board of Directors of NHPC Limited in its meeting held today i.e. Monday, 29th May, 2023 (meeting commenced at 05:00 P.M. and concluded at 08:45 P.M.) has considered and approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2023, after review by the Audit Committee. data.caption: Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors - Approval Of Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) Of The Company For The Quarter And Half-Year Ended On 30Th September, 2022
data.news_body:
In compliance to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, it is to inform that Board of Directors of NHPC Limited in its meeting held today i.e. Thursday, 10th November, 2022 (meeting commenced at 12:30 P.M. and concluded at 02:55 P.M.) has considered and approved the Un audited financial results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half-year ended on 30th September, 2022.

A copy of the approved un-audited financial results along with Limited Review Report issued by Joint Statutory Auditors of the Company is enclosed herewith.

In terms of Regulation 54 read with Regulation 56(1)(d) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, Statutory Auditor''s certificate with respect to listed debt securities of the Company as on September 30, 2022 is also enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors - Approval Of Un-Audited Financial Results  (Standalone And Consolidated) Of The Company For The Quarter  Ended On 30Th June,  2022.
data.news_body:
In continuation to our earlier letter dated 20.07.2022 and 05.08.2022 and in compliance to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing and Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, it is to inform that Board of Directors of NHPC Limited in its meeting held today i.e. Wednesday, 10th August, 2022 (meeting commenced at 12:00 Noon and agenda regarding approval of financial results concluded at 01:50 P.M.) has considered and approved the Un-audited financial results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended on 30th June, 2022.

A copy of the approved un-audited financial results along with Limited Review Report issued by Joint Statutory Auditors of the Company is enclosed herewith. In terms of Regulation 54 read with Regulation 56(1)(d) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, Statutory Auditor''s certificate with respect to listed debt securities of the Company as on June 30, 2022 is also enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Results- Financial Results For March 31, 2022 And Auditors'''' Report.
data.news_body: In continuation to our earlier letter dated 25.05.2022 on the subject cited above, please find enclosed herewith a copy of auditors' report alongwith Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2022.  The Joint Statutory Auditors have issued unmodified opinion on Annual Audited Financial results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the year ended 31st March, 2022.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing And Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 Regarding Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of NHPC Limited Held On Wednesday, 25Th May, 2022
data.news_body:
In continuation to our earlier letter dated 02.05.2022 it is to inform that Board of Directors of NHPC Limited in its meeting held today i.e. Wednesday, 25th May, 2022 (meeting commenced at 12:00 Noon and concluded at 01:50 P.M.) has considered and approved the following:
1. Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and year ended on 31.03.2022. A copy of Audited Financial Results is enclosed herewith. The Auditors' Report will be forwarded in due course.
The Board of Directors in the aforesaid meeting has also recommended final dividend @ 5% of face value of Rs 10/- per share (Re.0.50 per equity share) on the paid up share capital of the Company for the FY 2021-22, subject to approval of shareholders in the ensuing Annual General Meeting. This is in addition to the interim dividend of Rs 1.31 per equity share for the FY 2021-22 paid in March, 2022. The final dividend, if declared, will be paid within the statutory period as per the CA2013.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: In continuation to earlier letter of even number dated 07.02.2022 and in compliance to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find attached herewith an investor presentation made at the earning conference call held today i.e. on14.02.2022 between 2:30 P.M. and 03:40 P.M. to discuss the results of 03 FY 2021-22 with analysts and investors.Further, it is to inform that no Unpublished Price Sensitive Information as per SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 has been shared/disclosed during the said conference call. This is for your information and record.

data.news_body:

data.news_body: Please refer to our earlier letter of even number dated August 5, 2021 on the cited subject. It is to inform that the Board of Directors of NHPC Limited in its meeting held today i.e. Friday, August 13, 2021 (meeting commenced at 12.05 PM and concluded at 3.45 PM) has considered and approved the un-audited financial results (standalone and consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended on June 30, 2021. data.caption: Results- Financial Results For March 31, 2021 And Auditors'' Report.
data.news_body: In continuation to our earlier letter dated June 10, 2021 on the subject cited above, please find enclosed herewith a copy of auditors' report along with audited financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2021. The Joint Statutory Auditors have issued unmodified opinion on Annual Audited Financial Statements (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the year ended 31st March, 2021.

data.caption: Annual Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) Of NHPC Limited For The Financial Year Ended 31St March, 2021 And Recommendation Of Final Dividend For FY 2020-21
data.news_body:
This is to inform that Board of Directors of NHPC Limited in its meeting held today i.e. Thursday, 10th June, 2021 (meeting commenced at 4:30 P.M. and agenda regarding approval of financial results concluded at 6.20 P.M) has considered and approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2021. Audited Financial Results is enclosed herewith. The Auditors' Report will be forwarded in due course.

The Board of Directors in the aforesaid meeting has also recommended final dividend @ 3.50% of face value of Rs 10/- per share (Re 0.35 per equity share) on the paid up share capital of the Company for the FY 2020-21 subject to approval of shareholders in the ensuing Annual General Meeting. This is in addition to the interim dividend of Rs 1.25 per equity share for the FY 2020-21 paid in March, 2021. The final dividend, if declared, will be paid within the statutory period as per the Companies Act, 2013.

data.caption: Results- Financial Results For Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2021 And Recommendation Of Final Dividend For FY 2020-21
data.news_body:
?????,
This is to inform that Board of Directors of NHPC Limited in its meeting held today i.e. Thursday, 10th June, 2021 (meeting commenced at 4:30 P.M. and agenda regarding approval of financial results concluded at 6.20 P.M) has considered and approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2021. Audited Financial Results is enclosed herewith. The Auditors' Report will be forwarded in due course.

The Board of Directors in the aforesaid meeting has also recommended final dividend @ 3.50% of face value of Rs 10/- per share (Re 0.35 per equity share) on the paid up share capital of the Company for the FY 2020-21 subject to approval of shareholders in the ensuing Annual General Meeting. This is in addition to the interim dividend of Rs 1.25 per equity share for the FY 2020-21 paid in March, 2021. The final dividend, if declared, will be paid within the statutory period as per the Companies Act, 2013.
